runs.comm: drifting outside leg, Amla anticipates turn as he offers no stroke. Off the pad and runs away to short fine leg
down the track and flicked between midwicket and mid-on
straight roller on middle, glanced to short fine leg as van Wyk gets off the mark
fullish and on off, Amla makes room and drives it inside out to the right of short cover. KW flings to his left from mid-off and stops the ball
flighted on the pads, eased to long-on
down the track and mis-hits the loft over KW at long-off
back of a length and slanted down leg, wide
fullish and on off, Amla shuffles across off and flicks it wristily behind square on the leg side. Very, very wristy and beats long leg as well
short and outside off, Amla is up on his tippy-toes as he punches it to the covers
back of a length and outside off, flash and a miss from Amla. That did not bounce as much as Amla anticipated
too full and straight, flipped with the wrists to the left of long leg
dug in short and wide outside off, Amla swings and does not connect. He lost his balance and nearly toppled over
shortish and nips in, dropped in front of backward point
back of a length and angled in from round the stumps, blocked
bouncer angled in with loads of shoulder. Van Wyk drops his wrists on it. One of the over
dug in short and on off, pulled down to long leg
pitched up and outside off, wristy drive to mid-off

The short ball works. The angle works. Banged in around a leg-stump line, Van Wyk is cramped for room as he attempts a pull. He was a touch early onto the shot and ends up looping it behind off the glove. Ronchi jumps and catches it
full and outside off, AB thrashes a drive but does not find the gap on the off side
room on offer outside off, AB cracks it towards point
Amla walks across off and flicks it beautifully fine of short fine leg. Amla special, taking it from outside off

dragged short and wide outside off. Amla cuts hard and hits it straight to Neesham at point. Amla is gutted as he drops to his knees. He did not get on top of the bounce. Two wickets in five balls for NZ
short and on a fourth-stump line, Rossouw drags a pull to leg
length and outside off, flat-batted to mid-off, diving save from KW
short and zipping away outside off with extra lift at 153.8ks. Beaten for pace and bounce
short and wide outside off, pulled to the left of mid-on. Not middled. Sodhi chases and keeps it to three
Rossow runs down the track, the bowler is wary of it as he pulls his length back. Pull and a miss
back of a length and width on offer outside off, flat-bat wallop past the covers. The ball raced away to the boundary
encore. Overpitched and outside off, rifled away through cover-point after stretching forward
back of a length and swerves in, swing and a miss from Rossouw. MM collapses in his followthrough
bumper, trampolines outside off at 145.3ks. Rossouw can't ramp it away
begins with a good length ball on off. AB smashes it up and over the covers
whoa, this is even better. Near half-volley outside off, AB bends his knees and crunches a drive past the covers, hits the gap, despite the packed off-side field
down the track, Neesham pulls his length back. AB wants a big hit, again. He ends up dribbling it to off
short midwicket nearly pulled off a stunner. Banged in short and outside off, swat-pulled away. Latham leaps off his feet, goes with two hands but can only parry it over
down the track, pulled from outside off to the left of mid-on
lifter outside off, enough legs on it to beat AB's attempted hook
flighted on off, forward and pushed back to the bowler
down the track, N Mac pulls his length back. Rossouw check-pulls it to long-on
AB show is on. Pushed through on a leg-stump line. AB goes low and slams a slog-sweep over square leg
And the AB show is over. Six and out! Neesham takes a well-judged overhead catch. Flatter and on off, AB baseball swings it in the air. Neesham settles under it at long-on
clipped off the pads through backward square leg
sliding across off, punched down to long-off
tossed up on middle, worked through midwicket
flat and on middle and leg, pulled to midwicket. Not middled
Bang! Rossouw treks down the track and lifts it from outside off over the bowler's head. Powerful strike..
pushed through outside off, he reverse-sweeps and does not connect
flatter ball, which is carved away to sweeper cover
shortish and outside off, pulled to cow corner
full and straight, milked through midwicket
dug in fractionally short and outside off, Rossouw latches onto it, cutting it in front of square on the off side
even shorter and outside off, pulled to deep square leg
full one outside off, which is pushed to the covers
drifting down leg, wide called
pitched up on middle, clipped to deep midwicket
banged short, not much sting on it as Behardien rolls his wrists and pulls it to deep backward square leg
pitched up and outside off, Behardien strides forward and drives it past short cover after meeting the pitch. He splits deep extra cover and sweeper cover as well
length ball, knocked in front of square leg for one
looped up on middle, bunted down to mid-off
legbreak outside off, forced to the covers. Williamson endures a bad bounce, takes it on his knee and deflects it towards the bowler
pushed through, Sodhi shortens his length. Helped behind square for one
Williamson takes a sharp catch at short midwicket. Sodhi slides it on middle and leg at 95.6ks, Rossow leaves the crease, pulls and finds the NZ captain. Behardien shakes his head
fullish and on middle from round the stumps, reverse-swept away behind point. Good timing
pushed through full, worked to midwicket
tossed up from round the stumps, blocked back to the bowler
quicker and outside off, drilled towards deep point
back of a length and angled in on middle, pushed down the ground
low full toss outside off, eased to sweeper cover
fired full, jabbed to mid-off
bumper down leg, ducked under. Wide called
back of a length and outside off, Behardien spanks it past the covers. He bent his knee and drilled a drive
fullish and comes in, pushed to mid-on
shortish ball hurries on off, Behardien yanks his bottom hand off the bat as he tamely punches it to mid-off
drifting onto the pads, nudged behind square
a tad overpitched on off, forward and driven to mid-off
short and skiddy on off, chopped in front of point
short again, the line is outside off, cut away firmly to sweeper cover
Miller shuffles across off, takes it from there and flicks it behind square for a couple. Looked like an offuctter from Neesham
full and on the stumps, thumped down to long-on
flat and sliding across off, a bit shortish in fact. He rocks back and clunks a cut in front of square, sweeper had no chance
Miller comes down the track, Sodhi drags his length back. Blocked back to the bowler
swept from middle and leg through backward square leg
pushed through outside off, flash and a miss
flat legbreak outside off, punched to sweeper cover
down the track, Sodhi goes shorter. Pulled away to deep midwicket
full ball on middle, Miller makes room and crashes it to long-off
yorker on middle from round the stumps, dug out through vacant midwicket. N Mac chases it and keeps it to one
flighted and outside off, Miller steps out and skewers it. It does not carry to long-on, though
Behardien now jumps down the track and reaps reward for positive intent. He lustily clubs it over midwicket

Behardien took his maiden T20 wicket off a full toss. He perishes to a full toss. Behardien shapes for a slog sweep, hits rather well but straight down the gullet of deep midwicket. South Africa five down; the asking rate rises to 12.77
straight roller on middle, punched to long-on
flat and turning away, Wiese looks to cut and ends up beaten
back of a length, comes in, punched to deep midwicket
shortish ball, pulled to the right of short fine leg
South Africa slide further; Wiese holes out to long-off. Tossed up just a shade outside off, Wiese clears his front leg and lofts. He does not get hold of it as N Mac runs in and pouches it
down the track and swiped to deep midwicket
darted outside off, punched towards long-on. Miller wants two, Phangiso isn't interested
good length and shoots low outside off. Phangiso aims to dig it out and is beaten by the inward movement
back of a length, turned through midwicket from off
a tad overpitched and outside off, Miller gets under it and pumps it over the covers
short ball with sting on it outside off, spliced pull in front of long-on
Neesham pulls pace off it. 110ks. Phangiso shuffles across off, misses the cutter. The ball almost shaves the off stump
KW pedals back and takes another good catch. Good length and outside off, Phangiso aims to lift it over cover. But does not get requisite timing on it. KW shows off his reflexes, again
length and on off from round the stumps, clobbered over cow corner. Miller hung back and dispatched it..
banged in short, mis-timed pull to deep midwicket
short and slanting away outside off, heaved to deep midwicket. Rabada rushes across for the second
short and climbs on a leg-stump line. Miller seeks to pull, swivels and finds deep backward square leg. Miller departs and with that South Africa's hopes. A few fans start to leave. MM roars
steered down to third man for one as this was fullish and outside off
fractionally short on middle, patted to the covers
full and on off, driven to long-on
length and outside off, lashed away past the covers
lifting ball, hurries onto the batsman, who misses the pull and takes it on the thigh
back of a length, punched to the covers
bumper outside off, Abbott wants to run it down to third man but to to no avail
MM tests Abbott with another short ball, which is flapped in the air, N Mac runs in from long-on, misjudges it. He looks to adjust, goes with one hand and shells it
short and outside off, pulled up and over midwicket
back of a length and outside off, under-edges it behind to the keeper
too full and on middle, jabbing drive to long-on
slower lifter on middle at 118ks, controlled pull to long-on
full and on middle, Abbott steps away outside leg and pings a drive to the right of mid-off. Some late consolation for the hosts
NZ square the series. Big whoosh and a miss off the last ball
